<S%H857>Come<s%> <S%H3947>you<s%>, say they, I will fetch <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and we will <S%H5433>fill<s%> ourselves with strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shall be as this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H3499>more<s%> <S%H1419>abundant<s%>.
